ReinforcedGate.name: ReinforcedGate
ReinforcedGate.description: At start of turn, add a <c=cardtrait>temp</c> <c=card>Fox Tale</c> to your hand.

FramjificentCore.name: FramjificentCore
FramjificentCore.description: Draw a card whenever you <c=cardtrait>exhaust</c> a card

ParadoxGrimoire.name: ParadoxGrimoire
ParadoxGrimoire.description: When you <c=cardtrait>exhaust</c> a card that is NOT 0 cost <c=cardtrait>AddCard</c> add a copy of it into your discard and draw piles

description.None: Attack for X, X = your highest status.
description.A: Attack for X, X = your highest status.
description.B: Attack for X, X = The Sum of your and the enemy ship's' highest status.

description.None: On draw add 2 <c=status>Heat<c/> to the enemy /n On play gain 2 <c=status>Temp<c/> and 1 <c=status>Heat<c/>.
description.A: On draw add 2 <c=status>Heat<c/> to the enemy /n On play gain 2 <c=status>Temp<c/> and 1 <c=status>Heat<c/>.
description.B: On draw add 2 <c=status>Heat<c/> to the enemy /n On play gain 2 <c=status>Temp<c/> and 1 <c=status>Heat<c/>.

description.None: Immediately after drawing add 1 <c=status>Corrode<c/> to the enemy and exhaust this card.
description.A: Immediately after drawing add 1 <c=status>Corrode<c/> to the enemy and exhaust this card.
description.B: Immediately after drawing add 1 <c=status>Corrode<c/> to the enemy and exhaust this card.

description.None: Add 2 <c=card>Miasma</c> to your Draw pile, and one <c=card>Toxic</c> to your Discard.
description.A: Add 2 <c=card>Miasma</c> to your Draw pile, and one <c=card>Toxic</c> to your Discard.
description.B: Add 3 <c=card>Miasma</c> to your Draw pile, and 2 <c=card>Toxic</c> to your Discard.

description.None: Attack for X, X = FireMines in MidRow.
description.A: Attack for X, X = FireMines in MidRow
description.B: Turn all Midrow objects into FireMines. Attack for X, X = FireMines in MidRow

description.None: Vanish non-cockpit ship parts. Until the start of the next turn, leaving only your cockpit
description.A: Vanish non-cockpit ship parts. Until the start of the next turn, leaving only your cockpit
description.B: Send all non-cockpit enemy ship parts to the third dimension

description.None: Attack for X, X = number of <c=cardtrait>exhaust</c> cards this combat
description.A: Attack for X, X = number of <c=cardtrait>exhaust</c> cards this combat
description.B: Attack for X, X = number of <c=cardtrait>exhaust</c> cards this combat
Turn all Midrow objects into FireMines.
